name: Life of Pi (itch)
description:
Life of Pi

The game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6. The deadline was 72 hours and theme was TAKE CARE. 

Since this game was inspired and made during 2020 quarantine. Goal of the game is to travel as far as possible and keep distance between other people. If you get closer to other people you will start losing your immunity and eventually get infected. 

Good luck!

You can watch process of making Life of Pi on my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvVA6XucF6LB0Re4qZ52fag?view_as=subscriber
